proced.title: DMC-S1000DBIKE-AAA-D00-00-00-00AA-022A-D_011-00_EN-US_1_1_regenerated_2_regenerated_3_regenerated.XML
proced.p: This document represents the converted markdown from the provided XML file, detailing Bike DModule context and non-context rules.
This document outlines the context and non-context rules defined within the provided DModule, detailing allowed values and project guidelines.
proced.title: Context Rules
Structure Object Rule Groups
Rule Group: Limit Type (@limitUnitType)
Rule Group: Threshold (@thresholdUnitOfMeasure)
Rule Group: Source Type (@sourceTypeCode)
Rule Group: Source Criticality (@sourceCriticality)
Rule Group: Verbatim Text (@verbatimStyle)

allowed_values.item: XML/SGML markup and related elements (element name, attribute name/value, entity name, processing instruction)
Program prompt, user input, output, listing, variable name/value, constant, class name, parameter name.

proced.title: Notation Rules
Notation
proced.notation_description: Flash animation is *not* allowed in this project.
proced.title: Non-Context Rules
Rule: BIKE-BR-00078
proced.rule_description: Bike data modules *must* be reviewed and approved by the EPWG (Engineering Publication Working Group) before publication.
proced.title: Rule: BIKE-BR-00079
proced.rule_description: The Bike data set *must* contain examples demonstrating the application of constructs and principles at various levels of conceptual sophistication.
